title: Dr. Regan Thomas
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body"><iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_0xMTchgOHE?rel=0&controls=0" width="853"></iframe>  
Facial plastic surgeon Dr. Regan Thomas and Art Institute curator Stephanie D’Alessandro examine the development of facial plastic surgery in the twentieth century and how our views of “wholeness” and beauty have changed since World War I.</section>
